segments.text: My attention keeps returning to the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself to get into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks so wobbly; its legs are splayed outward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be tilting backward, ready to give way any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the instability from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite alarming to watch him balanced so high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookies that he doesn't seem to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised he hasn't lost his balance already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any sudden movement could send him tumbling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is standing so close, she might get caught in the fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a heart-stopping moment, waiting for it to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach out and stabilize that stool for him.
segments.speaker: PAR
